<script src="https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.12.0/jquery.min.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript">
	alert("ahoj");
	
	function sendRequest() {
		var xhttp = new XMLHttpRequest();
	  	xhttp.onreadystatechange = function() {
	    if (xhttp.readyState == 4 && xhttp.status == 200) {
			var anotherButton = document.createElement("P");
			var t = document.createTextNode(xhttp.responseText);
			anotherButton.appendChild(t);
			document.body.appendChild(anotherButton);	
	    } else { 
       	  	alert("nepovedlo se");
		}
	  };
	  xhttp.open("GET", "https://rawgit.com/ruzicm18/gadgets/master/version1/index.html", true);
	  xhttp.send();
	}
	
	var btn = document.createElement("BUTTON");        // Create a <button> element
	btn.onclick = sendRequest;
	var t = document.createTextNode("CLICK ME");       // Create a text node
	btn.appendChild(t);                                // Append the text to <button>
	document.body.appendChild(btn);                    // Append <button> to <body>
</script>
